TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_matas, title = matas, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/matas} }

S.FORM: matas gaga na matas la'iy likuy ga, siki lama tkba' kwara yow na gaga mluyak, kba' cminun, mlahang gaga, mnwah mgaga uy ga ptasan la. la'iy knerin mlahang sali', kba' momah, kba' cminun lukus ro tmami tmmyan. ba'un naha kwara yow haca laga, ptasan naha la. mlikuy ga ptasan lihuy ro yabay naha. knerin ga ptasan naha lihuy ro reyas naha. bi'an naha lalu na m'likuy baley ro lalu m'knerin baley la, ini ptasiy ga musa ssya'an cyoli' naha la.

matas gaga na matas la'iy likoy ga, siki lama tkba' kwara yow na gaga mloyak, kba' cminon, mlahang gaga, mnwah mgaga oy ga ptasan la. la'iy knerin mlahang sali', kba' momah, kba' cminon lokos ro tmami tmmyan. ba'on naha kwara yow haca laga, ptasan naha la. mlikoy ga ptasan lihoy ro yabay naha. knerin ga ptasan naha lihoy ro reyas naha. bi'an naha lalo na m'likoy baley ro lalo m'knerin baley la, ini ptasiy ga mosa ssya'an cyoli' naha la.
